title: Eulepetopsis vitrea
text:
Eulepetopsis vitrea is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="true%20limpet">true limpet</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Neolepetopsidae">Neolepetopsidae</a>, one of the families of true limpets.
"Eulepetopsis vitrea" is the only species in the genus Eulepetopsis.
Distribution.
<a href="Galapagos%20Rift">Galapagos Rift</a> and the <a href="East%20Pacific%20Rise">East Pacific Rise</a>
Habitat.
hydrothermal vents
